title: (x) Lucky Strike logo - custom (similar to Futura Cond) {Marten, Jan E}
content:
Hi there,

can anyone tell me the typeface used for the Lucky Strike logo, I have a feeling it may be custom so any other faces that look similar would be great

Thanks

Matt

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020171529im_/http:/typophile.com/files/lucky_strike_4356.jpg)
author: Matt Squire

comments.content: Search Typophile via Google and you'll find information on this. The logo is done by Raymond Loewy and the closest I think you'll get are [Futura Bold Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020171529/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/efscangraphic/futura-sb/bold-con/testdrive.html?s=LUCKY+STRIKE&p=48).
Futura Condensed Extra Bold or Antique Olive Bold Condensed come close.
AH ha, thanks, I had a search and ofund the article on Mr Loewy but must have missed the type. Thanks for the speedy response
